value:
Skies so pretty... Everyone laughing...
Practically paradise.

The ocean is boundless. When I see
it...I want to create a future for my
world that offers boundless hope.

The sun's rays are so s-strong... Just
standing outside for a few minutes, I
get so sweaty...

Ahh! I SPY FOUL FIENDS FROM
ANOTHER REALM! What? O-oh!
Those are our allies?

Oh... I'm doing fine. It's just that this
swimsuit is a little tight...so I keep
trying to adjust it.

Are...are you friends with
$Nf?$k$pI was asked to say hel— EEK! Don't
come any closer!

Maybe I do take after my
mother...
That went pretty well... I think.

Mother did warn me that bad
fortune would follow me...

Thanks to this...I think I'll be able
to help out even more.

My name is Noire, and... W-wait a
minute... Where are we going?

Aah! DASTARD! DO NOT DARE
CHASE ME—$k$pOh, $Nu!$k$pI'm so s-sorry... I'm not scared of
you... I was just caught up in an old
memory.$k$pLife was so scary where I used to
be... But it's so calm here. I catch
myself wondering if it's even real...$k$pI hope that I can take my mother and
all of my friends to visit the sparkling
ocean I visited during the summer.$k$pIt would be so nice, and we'd always
have something beautiful to
remember...$k$pI would be so happy if you came
along, too, and stayed by my side.
えいっ
それっ
くっ…！
貴様何をする！
Into the sea with you!
Tropical attack!
Time to drown!
What a summer!
The beach... So nice.
うふふ…
This swimsuit—it's a LITTLE AWKWARD!
I've always wanted to play tag on the beach, along the water's edge.
That's an interesting way you summoners have of greeting people...
I do love the beach. But the sun is a little bit strong for me...
WHAT? Oh, my swimsuit was coming off? Thanks...
The summer skies are so beautiful. Where I come from, it's never like that...
Someday, I'd like to take all of the Heroes I've met to the beach. I think we'd have such a nice time together.
What?
This heat…
Ready to hit the beach?
